content:
Buffalo Wild Wings has a convenient online ordering system that allows you to customize your order, pay ahead of time, and pick it up at your preferred location.

Here's how you can place your order online:

1. Visit the Buffalo Wild Wings website ([www.buffalowildwings.com](http://www.buffalowildwings.com)) and click on "Order Online" at the top right corner.
2. Enter your location or zip code to find your nearest restaurant.
3. Choose "Pickup" as your delivery option.
4. Select the menu items you'd like to order, including your buffalo wings, sides, and drinks. You can customize your wings with different sauces, seasonings, and toppings.
5. Review your order summary and make any necessary changes.
6. Log in or create an account to proceed to payment.
7. Pay for your order online using a credit card or digital payment method like Apple Pay or Google Pay.
8. Choose your pickup time and confirm your order.

Once you've placed your order, you'll receive an email confirmation with your order details and a pickup time. When you arrive at the restaurant, just let them know your name and they'll have your order ready for you.

Buffalo Wild Wings also has a mobile app (available for iOS and Android) that allows you to order online and pay ahead of time. The app offers a similar ordering process to the website, and you can also use it to earn rewards, track your points, and redeem offers.

By ordering online and picking up, you'll save time and avoid waiting for delivery. Enjoy your wings and the game!
